description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Salmon With Chive Scrambled Egg recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Smoked Salmon With Chive Scrambled Egg Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 slices gluten-free bread, toasted and buttered, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Using a hand whisk, whisk the eggs and fromage frais together with some salt and pepper.
Heat a saucepan over a medium heat and pour in the egg mixture. Cook for a minute, and then using a spatula, gently push the egg around to allow it all to cook.
When the egg looks like creamy curds, stir in the chives and smoked salmon and serve immediately on the toast, if using.
